name: Chain Ring
description: According to Race Face, the Cinch direct mount chainring has been designed to create a tighter interface between the inner and outer links to prevent the chain from jumping.

name: Seat Post
description: Like handlebars, wheels, and nearly all other bike components, seatposts come in a variety of materials, the most common being aluminium and carbon fibre.

name: Handlebars
description: The best road handlebar for you should offer a comfortable transition between the tops, hoods and drops, and a drop shape you are capable of.
